page.title: 06SIX HOUSEHOLDS
page.content: Very few people live in this area as it is covered by either forest or cultivated arable land. There are only six households in the area, mainly situated on the edge of the forest, and one holiday home. Employment is mainly concerned with agriculture. In addition a gamekeeper, employed by a local shooting syndicate, lives and works in the forest protecting and rearing pheasants. Also on the fringe of the area a quantity surveyor runs his business from home but his employees all live outside the area.
